p:
Initial susceptibility values in seasons of the same strain were highly correlated (e.g. correlation coefficient 0.90 between initial susceptibility in 2011 and 2013). The posterior densities had similar forms between strains, however the H3N2 seasons (2014 & 2016) had slightly lower median
R ¯
0
, associated with slightly higher initial susceptibility (Tables 1 & 2). For H3N2 seasons, the maximum bivariate posterior density occurred at
R ¯
0
= 4 . 71
and initial susceptibility 0.22 (in 2014) ( S1 Text).
